message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1150000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $1050000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1050000 is still a bit lower than what I'm looking for. I'm willing to come down to $1100000. This is a significant compromise, and I'm confident that this product will be worth every penny to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value I see in the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1075000. I hope this offers a reasonable compromise.

Bob,  I appreciate your continued interest in the product and your willingness to negotiate. However, $1075000 still doesn't reflect the value I know this product brings. I'm willing to come down to $1090000 as a final offer. This price is fair considering the value you'll receive and the limited time remaining in our negotiation.
I respect your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1085000. I believe this strikes a balance between our interests.
